summary: ftrace: Fix recursive locking direct_mutex in ftrace_modify_direct_caller
details:
ftrace: Fix recursive locking direct_mutex in ftrace_modify_direct_caller

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 2482eacb685b6500e158268befbe6c90de5f166a, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 53cd885bc5c3ea283cc9c00ca6446c778f00bfba. For more details please see the references link.
